pageBlocks.byLine: Welcome to YakShaver's {public roadmap}! This is a live document and will be updated regularly

items.title: Multi-Organization Support for NDC Melbourne
items.description: The platform is now ready for NDC Melbourne, with multi-tenancy support allowing multiple users and organizations to manage their environments more efficiently.

items.title: Core Improvements from SSW Staff Feedback
items.description: We implemented essential improvements identified by SSW staff, enhancing performance and streamlining common workflow tasks across the platform.

items.title: Updated Website and Pricing Structure
items.description: We refreshed the website and pricing information to clearly communicate available features and options for different customer segments

items.title: Simplified Client Tenant Setup
items.description: Setting up a new client tenant is now easier. The administrative portal has been improved to streamline the onboarding process.

items.title: Try It Now Feature
items.description: We’re developing a "Try It Now" experience for NDC Melbourne attendees. This will allow users to interact with key features before committing to a full setup.

items.title: Support for Zendesk and Jira Integration
items.description: We are expanding integration capabilities beyond GitHub and Azure DevOps to include Zendesk and Jira, enabling teams to maintain their existing workflows.

items.title: Additional Transcript Source Connections
items.description: We are adding support for additional transcript sources beyond Microsoft Teams and Snagit, including CustomGPT, Loom, and OBS connections.

items.title: Quality-of-Life Improvements
items.description: We are implementing several user-requested enhancements to make the software more intuitive and reduce steps needed for common actions.

items.title: Redesigned Agentic Workflow
items.description: We're replacing the current workflow with a new agentic system that allows for more automation and better task management

items.title: More Data Source Options (Excel, Active Directory, Google Cloud, etc.)
items.description: We’re adding support for people data from sources beyond Dynamics, including Excel, Active Directory, and Google Cloud.

items.title: More Project Data Source Options (Excel, Salesforce, etc.)
items.description: Support for project data integration is expanding to include Excel and Salesforce, making it easier to manage projects across different platforms.
